description.value: An extension to provide the time at which the agreement was made.

purpose.value: This extension represents the AdministrationAgreementDateTime concept of the Dutch zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) [AdministrationAgreement v1.0.3 (2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/AdministrationAgreement-v1.0.3(2020EN)).

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

definition.value: The time at which the agreement was made.
